content: flower pearl earrings pattern here is the pattern for my flower pearl earrings for late beginner/intermediate crocheters you will need per earring -lace weight yarn in two colors -1 5mm hook -1-4 jump rings depending on if you want pearls -jump ring pliers -4cm earring hoop -an earring backing i use silicone one -scissors optional -1-3 pearls -earring card stitches -single_crochet single_crochet -single_crochet increase single_crochet increase two single_crochet in one stitch -slip_stitch slip_stitch -v_stitch with chain 2 v_stitch -double_crochet double_crochet -chain chain -skip skip green yarn -into the metal earring hoop make 35 single_crochet slip_stitch closed -chain 1 10 single_crochet increase make v_stitch like this into the same stitch double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet then skip 1 repeat 5 more times so you have 6 v-stitches single_crochet increase to the end cut yarn and weave in your ends colored yarn -join in with a new color the flowers to the first chain 2 space of the v_stitch and make 5 double_crochet single_crochet into the chain 1 space repeat this 5dc into the chain 2 space single_crochet into the chain 1 space 5 more times so all the v-stitches have a 5 double_crochet cluster in them cut yarn and weave in your ends add a jump ring to the top of the earring and then add the earring itself metal part to the jump ring put the earring to the earring card and close with an earring backer optional adding the pearls for this part i used 1 larger and 2 smaller pearls with a ring in them with a jump ring i added the smaller beads to the first and sixth cluster in the middle of the clusters and the bigger one to the third one in the middle of it thank you for reading my pattern
